text:
@albamonica If I were Media, I would avoid the @WhiteHouse like the plague! Media Orgs should not allow Reporters to take that risk.
How many Staffers now have tested positive? Obviously @realDonaldTrump @VP @PressSec & Advisors are trying magically will #coronavirus away & failing.
